title: My google assistant is no longer opening music from my music library
content:
When I used the command "Ok Google shuffle my thumbs up playlist" it tells me I do not have spotify installed on my phone. This worked last week, and now has stopped. Any time I try to play any music via the voice assistant it only tries to open Spotify. I just want to play music I have downloaded via the Google Play Music app. FYI, i have download only selected.

Help..
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 2
